snippet: The proposal, called the Universal Displaced Worker Program, would assist as many as one million workers with counseling and job searches.
abstract: Obama administration officials say the Universal Displaced Worker Program proposal would assist as many as one million workers with counseling and job searches.
lead_paragraph: The proposal, called the Universal Displaced Worker Program, would assist as many as one million workers with counseling and job searches.

headline.seo: White House Outlines Plan to Help Job Seekers
headline.main: White House Outlines Plan to Help With Job Search
headline.print_headline: White House Outlines Plan To Help With Job Search
